text: The CAF Champions League is a seasonal association football competition established in 1964. The CAF Champions League is open to the league champions of all Confederation of African Football member associations, as well as to the clubs finishing second in the strongest leagues from the CAF 5-Year Ranking and finally, the defending champions of the competition participate too. Prior to the 1997 season, the tournament was named the African Cup of Champions Clubs. ==List of finals== {|class="wikitable" |+Key |- | width="40" align="center" bgcolor="#fbceb1" | | Match was won during extra time |- | width="40" align="center" bgcolor="#ffff99" |# | Match was won on away goals |- | width="40" align="center" bgcolor="#cedff2" |* | Match was won on a penalty shoot-out |- |
